about_the_game:
You're stuck in an infinite loop in the theater. You must escape to exit 7 to open the hidden door. Go forward and find the hidden door.

About This Game
"Escape from exit 7 of the theater" is a walking simulator game. When you start, the exit gauge is 0. When the exit gauge is 0, there is no hidden dark history. When the exit gauge is 7, the hidden door opens and you can clear the game. If you get the OX problem wrong, the exit gauge will be reset.

Play time
10-50 minutes

Controls
Character movement is done using W, S, A, and D, and jumping is done with the space bar. If you are unable to move because the terrain is stuck, you can reset to the initial position with the R button.
